short_summary: Acquiring a series of aerial photographs
description: The contract consists of acquiring a series of aerial photographs on the Lower North Shore and on the north and south shores of the Middle Estuary of the St. Lawrence River in the province of Quebec. The acquisition will be made following previously identified flight lines. The photos acquired will feed the bank of images of the coast of Quebec obtained since 2015 by DFO. They will be used to identify and describe eelgrass beds and increase knowledge of the coastal zone, an important ecosystem for many species in the St. Lawrence. These flights must be made between September and October 8, 2023 to match the eelgrass growing season. This document contains all the information necessary to understand the requirements related to the contract.
full_summary:
# Aerial Photography Contract for Lower North Shore and St. Lawrence Estuary

## Announcement Details

* **Solicitation Number:** 30004592
* **Reference Number:** cb-8549-71663701
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** August 28, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 12, 2023 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Status:** Expired

## Contract Description

The Government of Canada's Fisheries and Oceans Canada department is soliciting a Request for Proposal (RFP) for aerial photography services to capture images of the Lower North Shore and the north and south shores of the Middle Estuary of the St. Lawrence River in Quebec, Canada.

## Contract Requirements

The successful bidder will be required to acquire aerial photographs following previously identified flight lines. The acquired images will be used to identify and describe eelgrass beds and increase knowledge of the coastal zone, an important ecosystem for many species in the St. Lawrence River. The imagery acquired will feed into the existing bank of images of the coast of Quebec obtained since 2015 by Fisheries and Oceans Canada.

## Important Dates

The expedition flights must be conducted between September 12, 2023, and October 8, 2023, to match the eelgrass growing season.

## Tender Documents

The complete tender notice, including all relevant information, can be downloaded from the following link: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8549/rfp-30004592-aerial-photos-lower-cote-nord-and-shore-of-the-st-lawrence.pdf>

## Contact Information

For any queries related to this RFP, please contact the following:

* **Name:** Louise Martel
* **Email:** louise.martel@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (819) 962-7325

Please note the importance of ensuring that any communication is in written form to ensure a paper trail. We appreciate your interest in this opportunity and wish you every success in your bid. If this tender announcement has expired, we thank you for your interest nonetheless.
